00044 
00045    void DdMdConfigIo::read(std::istream &in)
00046    {
00047       // Calculate atom and bond capacities for entire simulation
00048       int atomCapacity = 0;
00049       int bondCapacity = 0;
00050       int nSpecies = simulation().nSpecies();
00051       int speciesCapacity = 0;
00052       int iSpec;
00053       Species* speciesPtr;
00054       for (iSpec = 0; iSpec < nSpecies; ++iSpec) {
00055          speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpec);
00056          speciesCapacity = speciesPtr->capacity();
00057          atomCapacity   += speciesCapacity*speciesPtr->nAtom();
00058          bondCapacity   += speciesCapacity*speciesPtr->nBond();
00059       }
00060 
00061       // Read boundary
00062       in >> Label("BOUNDARY");
00063       in >> system().boundary();
00064 
00065       // Read atomic positions
00066       // Atom tags must appear in order, numbered from 0
00067       // Number of atoms must match atomCapacity.
00068       in >> Label("ATOMS");
00069       int nAtom;
00070       in >> nAtom;
00071       if (nAtom != atomCapacity) {
00072          UTIL_THROW("nAtom != atomCapacity");
00073       }
00074       Molecule*                molPtr;
00075       Molecule::AtomIterator   atomIter;
00076       int iMol, nMolecule, atomId, atomTypeId;
00077       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < nSpecies; ++iSpec) {
00078          speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpec);
00079          nMolecule  = speciesPtr->capacity();
00080          for (iMol = 0; iMol < nMolecule; ++iMol) {
00081             molPtr = &(speciesPtr->reservoir().pop());
00082             system().addMolecule(*molPtr);
00083    
00084             // Read positions.
00085             for (molPtr->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00086 
00087                in >> atomId >> atomTypeId;
00088                if (atomId != atomIter->id()) {
00089                   UTIL_THROW("Atom tags not ordered");
00090                }
00091 
00092                in >> atomIter->position();
00093                in >> atomIter->velocity();
00094  
00095             }
00096          }
00097       }
00098 
00099    }
00100 
00101 
00102    void DdMdConfigIo::write(std::ostream &out)
00103    {
00104       // Count total numbers of atoms and bonds in all species.
00105       Species  *speciesPtr;
00106       int iSpec, nMolecule;
00107       int nAtom = 0;
00108       int nBond = 0;
00109       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00110       int nAngle = 0;
00111       #endif
00112       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00113       int nDihedral = 0;
00114       #endif
00115       for (iSpec = 0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00116          speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpec);
00117          nMolecule  = system().nMolecule(iSpec);
00118          nAtom += nMolecule*(speciesPtr->nAtom());
00119          nBond += nMolecule*(speciesPtr->nBond());
00120          #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00121          nAngle += nMolecule*(speciesPtr->nAngle());
00122          #endif
00123          #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00124          nDihedral += nMolecule*(speciesPtr->nDihedral());
00125          #endif
00126       }
00127 
00128       // Write boundary
00129       out << "BOUNDARY" << std::endl;
00130       out << system().boundary() << std::endl;
00131       out << std::endl;
00132 
00133       // Write atoms
00134       out << "ATOMS" << std::endl;
00135       out << "nAtom  " << nAtom << std::endl;
00136       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00137       Molecule::AtomIterator   atomIter;
00138       int i = 0;
00139       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00140          system().begin(iSpec, molIter); 
00141          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00142             molIter->begin(atomIter); 
00143             for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00144                out << Int(atomIter->id(), 10);
00145                out << Int(atomIter->typeId(), 5);
00146                out << atomIter->position();
00147                out << atomIter->velocity();
00148                out << std::endl;
00149                ++i;
00150             }
00151          }
00152       }
00153       out << std::endl;
00154 
00155       // Write Bonds
00156       out << "BONDS" << std::endl;
00157       out << "nBond  " << nBond << std::endl;
00158       Molecule::BondIterator bondIter;
00159       i = 0;
00160       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00161          if (system().simulation().species(iSpec).nBond() > 0) {
00162             system().begin(iSpec, molIter); 
00163             for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00164                molIter->begin(bondIter); 
00165                for ( ; bondIter.notEnd(); ++bondIter) {
00166                   out << Int(i, 8) << Int(bondIter->typeId(), 5);
00167                   out << Int(bondIter->atom(0).id(), 10);
00168                   out << Int(bondIter->atom(1).id(), 10);
00169                   out << std::endl;
00170                   ++i;
00171                }
00172             }
00173          }
00174       }
00175       out << std::endl;
00176 
00177       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00178       // Write Angles
00179       out << "ANGLES" << std::endl;
00180       out << "nAngle  " << nAngle << std::endl;
00181       Molecule::AngleIterator angleIter;
00182       i = 0;
00183       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00184          if (system().simulation().species(iSpec).nAngle() > 0) {
00185             system().begin(iSpec, molIter); 
00186             for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00187                molIter->begin(angleIter); 
00188                for ( ; angleIter.notEnd(); ++angleIter) {
00189                   out << Int(i, 8) << Int(angleIter->typeId(), 5);
00190                   out << Int(angleIter->atom(0).id(), 10);
00191                   out << Int(angleIter->atom(1).id(), 10);
00192                   out << Int(angleIter->atom(2).id(), 10);
00193                   out << std::endl;
00194                   ++i;
00195                }
00196             }
00197          }
00198       }
00199       out << std::endl;
00200       #endif
00201 
00202       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00203       // Write Dihedral
00204       out << "DIHEDRALS" << std::endl;
00205       out << "nDihedral  " << nDihedral << std::endl;
00206       Molecule::DihedralIterator dihedralIter;
00207       i = 0;
00208       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00209          if (system().simulation().species(iSpec).nDihedral() > 0) {
00210             system().begin(iSpec, molIter); 
00211             for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00212                molIter->begin(dihedralIter); 
00213                for ( ; dihedralIter.notEnd(); ++dihedralIter) {
00214                   out << Int(i, 8) << Int(dihedralIter->typeId(), 5);
00215                   out << Int(dihedralIter->atom(0).id(), 10);
00216                   out << Int(dihedralIter->atom(1).id(), 10);
00217                   out << Int(dihedralIter->atom(2).id(), 10);
00218                   out << Int(dihedralIter->atom(3).id(), 10);
00219                   out << std::endl;
00220                   ++i;
00221                }
00222             }
00223          }
00224       }
00225       out << std::endl;
00226       #endif
00227 
00228       // Reset Format defaults to initialization values
00229       Format::initStatic();
00230    }
00231  
00232 }
